sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_action_status.BlockedTaskAjax</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>The AJAX script to set the unblocked time and user for blocked by records.</description>
        <name>BlockedTaskAjax</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var BlockedTaskAjax = Class.create();
BlockedTaskAjax.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	ajaxFunction_unblockTask: function() {
		var taskList = this.getParameter('sysparm_task');
		var sysIds = taskList.split(',');

		for(var i = 0; i < sysIds.length; i ++){
			var blockedByGr = new GlideRecord('sn_action_status_blocked_by');
			
			if(blockedByGr.get(sysIds[i] + '') && blockedByGr.canWrite()){
				if(gs.nil(blockedByGr.unblocked_by) && gs.nil(blockedByGr.unblocked_on)){
					blockedByGr.setValue('unblocked_by', gs.getUserID());
					blockedByGr.setValue('unblocked_on', new GlideDateTime().getValue());
					blockedByGr.update();
				}
				else{
					gs.error('The blocked task with sys id ' + blockedByGr.getUniqueValue() + ' was already unblocked before');
				}
			}
		}
	},
	
	type: 'BlockedTaskAjax'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-08-10 19:02:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>29c2d2520bb31300c9c86c9037673aa0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>BlockedTaskAjax</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Action Status" source="sn_action_status">214622670b571300c9c86c9037673a6f</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Action Status">214622670b571300c9c86c9037673a6f</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_29c2d2520bb31300c9c86c9037673aa0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-05-27 16:13:29</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
